languages.text: "Искупление ваше будет омыто в крови неверных, коей утолите вы вечную жажду богов".

traits.locale_text: "Искупление ваше будет омыто в крови неверных, коей утолите вы вечную жажду богов".

languages.text: "Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."
languages.original_text: "Искупление ваше будет омыто в крови неверных, коей утолите вы вечную жажду богов".

traits.locale_text: "Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the gods' eternal thirst."
"Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the gods' eternal thirst."
"Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."
"Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."
"Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."
"Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."

languages.text: “你的救赎将以异端分子的鲜血来洗刷。这样一来，你就能满足真神永恒的渴求。”
languages.original_text: "Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."

traits.locale_text: “你的救赎将以异端分子的鲜血来洗刷。这样一来，你就能满足真神永恒的渴求。”

languages.text: «Vuestra redención vendrá bañada en la sangre de los infieles, que saciará la eterna sed de los verdaderos dioses».
languages.original_text: "Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."

traits.locale_text: «Vuestra redención vendrá bañada en la sangre de los infieles, que saciará la eterna sed de los verdaderos dioses».

languages.text: 「汝の救済は異教徒の血で洗われ、そして真の神々の永遠なる渇きをたっぷりと癒すのです」
languages.original_text: "Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."

traits.locale_text: 「汝の救済は異教徒の血で洗われ、そして真の神々の永遠なる渇きをたっぷりと癒すのです」

languages.text: "Eure Erlösung wird überflutet werden vom Blut der Heiden, und so werdet Ihr den ewigen Durst der wahren Götter löschen."
languages.original_text: "Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Erlösung wird überflutet werden vom Blut der Heiden, und so werdet Ihr den ewigen Durst der wahren Götter löschen."

languages.text: « C'est par le sang des infidèles que s'accomplira votre rédemption et que vous étancherez la soif éternelle des vrais dieux. »
languages.original_text: "Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."

traits.locale_text: « C'est par le sang des infidèles que s'accomplira votre rédemption et que vous étancherez la soif éternelle des vrais dieux. »

languages.text: "Kurtuluşun, küffarların kanıyla yıkanacak. Gerçek tanrıların sonsuz arzularını karşılayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Your redemption will be awash with the blood of heathens, and thus will you sate the true gods' eternal thirst."

traits.locale_text: "Kurtuluşun, küffarların kanıyla yıkanacak. Gerçek tanrıların sonsuz arzularını karşılayacaksın."
